description: small woven towel; hemmed on two sides; light blue and white; horizontal stripe at top and bottom; three vertical stripes--widest at center; "H" monogram in white on center vertical stripe at one end; blue and white twill tape loop at top on back
inscription:
Inscription

on twill tape loop, in black ink: [DIFF]; LLC on back, in black ink: [VM]
object_name: Guest towel, from a set of six
title: Guest towel, from a set of six
